generation

Class BSPBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • generation.BSPBuilder

  • public class BSPBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the responsibility to obtain the tree of BSP nodes for a given maze. This code is refactored code from MazeBuilder.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes. Refactored by Peter Kemper
